law.catch_line: Any person who is aggrieved by any decision or finding of the Commissioner under this subtitle may a...
law.text: Any person who is aggrieved by any decision or finding of the Commissioner under this subtitle may appeal to the circuit court for the county in which the aggrieved person resides or has a principal place of business, or, if the aggrieved person resides or has a principal place of business in Baltimore City, to the Circuit Court for Baltimore City.
